mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_NO AS userNo, u.USER_NAME AS nickname, u.USER_PROFILE AS profileImage, r.RES_COUNT AS reservationCount, r.REVIEW_COUNT AS reviewCount, r.RANDOM_COUNT AS randomCount FROM TBL_USER u LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_ACT_INFO r ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT u.USER_NO AS userNo, u.USER_ID AS userId, s.STORE_NAME AS storeName, s.STORE_NO AS storeNo, r.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, r.REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate, r.REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewText, r.REVIEW_SCOPE AS star FROM TBL_REVIEW r LEFT JOIN TBL_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_STORE s ON s.STORE_NO = r.STORE_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
ORDER BY reviewNo DESC;

SELECT u.USER_PROFILE AS userProfile, u.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_NAME AS userName, u.USER_NO AS userNo, s.STORE_NAME AS storeName, s.STORE_NO AS storeNo, r.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, r.REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate, r.REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewText, r.REVIEW_SCOPE AS star, r.REVIEW_IMG AS reviewPicture FROM TBL_REVIEW r LEFT JOIN TBL_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_STORE s ON s.STORE_NO = r.STORE_NO WHERE r.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo};

SELECT u.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_NO AS userNo, i.INQ_NO AS inquiryNo, i.INQ_TITLE AS title, i.INQ_CONTENT AS text, i.INQ_DATE AS inquiryDate, i.ANS_TITLE AS answerTitle, i.ANS_CONTENT AS answerContent, i.ANS_DATE AS answerDate, i.FILE AS file, i.STATE AS inquiryState, c.CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo, c.CATEGORY_NAME AS category FROM TBL_INQUIRY i LEFT JOIN TBL_USER u ON u.USER_NO = i.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_INQUIRY_CATEGORY c ON c.CATEGORY_NO = i.CATEGORY_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY i.INQ_NO DESC;
SELECT FILE FROM TBL_INQUIRY WHERE INQ_NO = #{inquiryNo}
SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, email FROM TBL_USER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_IMG FROM TBL_REVIEW r JOIN TBL_USER u ON r.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE r.USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=BIGINT}
